campaign_description:
Arrow Markets democratizes options market making.

Arrow Markets is a decentralized options AMM on Avalanche. We implement a dynamic AMM that handles the creation and settlement of options on crypto-assets as well as the delta hedging of the pool. Arrow democratizes market making by allowing anybody to easily contribute liquidity to the protocol in addition to the conventional market makers in exchange for platform income.


Features

Cash-settled: A single numeraire is used to settle all contingent claims. This means underliers can be on-chain or off-chain. Decentralized: Code is Law that replaces centralized settlement. Implemented through a network of DACs. Fast and Secure: Runs on Avalanche virtual machines. Front runner resistant and blazing fast. Prolific: Customize and combine options, call spreads, and put spreads.


The Technology Suite

The Arrow protocol implements a decentralized aggregate counterparty (DAC) to act as both a settlement authority and a funding vehicle for each user-chosen reference asset. We call the DAC coupled with a contract factory a decentralized financial market (DFM). DFMs live on blockchains and generate economies of scale for contingent contract creation and settlement.
title: Arrow Market Waitlist

Mission specific process


1„ÄÅBy binding your personal Twitter account on the veDAO official website, your wallet address automatically gets whitelisted. ‚Äãhttps://app.vedao.com/profile

2„ÄÅEach eligible address can claim 500,000 AlphaDAO (worth $5,000) by paying a small transaction fee (estimated to be 0.005 BNB). Once you claim AlphaDAO, the system will automatically stake it for you in the background. During the staking period, you will have governance rights on veDAO, allowing you to participate in voting, submit projects, and write project reviews.

3„ÄÅYou can click on any of the projects to vote. ‚Äãhttps://app.vedao.com/projects

4„ÄÅPlease submit a screenshot of your successful vote.ÔºàIn the picture we can see the address of your walletÔºâ


Claim instructions


1„ÄÅAfter you get whitelisted, you can mint a silver badge for free on the veDAO website. You just need to pay a little gas fee (expected to be less than 0.005BNB). https://www.vedao.com/nft


Benefits of the veDAO Community Silver Badge NFT


1„ÄÅHolders can claim 500,000 AlphaDAO.

2„ÄÅHolders enjoy Talent Scout benefits and can apply for Talent Scout status to receive an additional 150,000 AlphaDAO.

3„ÄÅHolders have the opportunity to receive tokens sponsored by other programs.


About AlphaDAO and DAO


The official token is DAO, with an issuance price of $0.01. After AlphaDAO is listed, you can redeem DAO. The redemption amount depends on your activities and contributions to the platform, ranging from a maximum of 500,000 DAO ($5,000) to a minimum of 50,000 DAO ($500).
